title: commander keen 2000
content: i have herd of some keen for xp called commander keen 2000 and 3d realms is working on a new keen they have no page for it its called the fight for justice its been worked on ever since 1991

title: Re: commander keen 2000
content:
Wow, interesting news! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]

Commander Keen 2000 is a fan game, one of the first. If I remember the name correct.

And your other bit of news is bullshit.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: commander keen 2000
content:
The Fight for Justice never had anything to do with Keen, it was just advertised in Keen 1 (?). I think it eventually became Quake, or it was cancelled and the engine was used to make Quake, or something.

I'm not sure exactly. I just remember it having something to do with Quake...------------------

[url=http://ericmushroom.livejournal.com/]My stupid journal thing[/url]

title: Re: commander keen 2000
content:
The main character in The Fight For Justice was to be named Quake; that must be what you were thinking of.

But anyways, if there were to be a new CK game, I'm not so sure they would call it Commander Keen 2000 seeing as it is 2007.

Thank you, Megakeen.-----------------------------------
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=izxrocVNVOk]Dnde Esta Jeff? [/url]
Take a look at these hands! The hands speaks. The hand of a government man.

content:

title: Re: commander keen 2000
content:

I'll lock this now.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
